name: Cursed Realms: Path Over The Abyss
summary: Cursed Realms - Path Over The Abyss is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the GZDoom source port. It was created by StormCatcher.77 in 2016 and uses the music track "Claustrophobia" by Vladislav Baymurzin (ClumsyDoomer) from the Plutonia MIDI Pack. It was awarded third place in the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.
